document.description: Windows Application Store featuring the ability to build your owns lists ... It can be used at a general store, a fast-food restaurant or ... Leave a review
document.body:
Welcome to allmyapps
We are sorry to inform you that the web browser you're using (Microsoft Internet Explorer 6) is not compatible with the allmyapps service. To be able to use allmyapps.com service, you need either to upgrade to a newer version of Microsoft Internet Explorer (version 8 or even 7 are ok) or switch to another web browser (like Firefox or Google Chrome for example...).
Thank you for your understanding. We hope to see you soon on allmyapps!
The allmyapps team
PS: If you are feeling frustrated by this message and want to express it loudly, please mail us at [email protected] !
